content.text: Hi! I'm a teacher and I enjoy my job, but I would like more time to sleep. I've started bringing a snack to work so I'm not starving by the time my students arrive.
Hi! I'm a musician and I'm proud of being able to make my passion a reality, even though I have a day job. I'm also a vegan and I have to find a way to get my siblings to take the cure.

That's so great that you're able to make your passion a reality! I'm so jealous, I've always wanted to be a musician. I'm a vegan too, but I haven't had much luck getting my siblings to take the cure.
Thanks! It's definitely not easy, but it's worth it. What kind of music do you play?
I play the guitar and I love to sing. I'm not very good at it, but I have a lot of fun.
That's awesome! I play the piano and I love to sing as well. I'm also not very good at it, but I have a lot of fun too.
That's great! We should play together sometime!
That would be fun! I'd love to.
Great! Let's exchange numbers and we can plan something.
